Traits.Name: Greenwalker
Traits.Description: All hobs ignore difficult and dangerous terrain.

Traits.Name: Body of the Land
Traits.Description: When defeated, roll a d6. The Hob collapses into the natural land, disappearing. Every space of this Hob becomes a height 1 terrain piece (5-6), difficult terrain (2-4), or a pit (1).

Traits.Name: Fortify
Traits.Description:
At the end of their turn, gains vigilance 1. Vigilance charges stack if a character gains more than one. A character can spend a charge of Vigilance for one of the following:
- When an adjacent ally is targeted as part of an ability, shift all damage and effects to you instead of that ally, regardless of range.
- Deal piercing fray damage to any foe that breaks adjacency with you for any reason during their turn.
Lose all vigilance charges at the start of your turn.

Traits.Name: Sturdy
Traits.Description: Immune to shove, daze, and stun.

Traits.Name: Crumbling Body
Traits.Description: Has 12 armor. Each time it takes damage from an action or ability, permanently reduce its armor by 1 for the rest of combat. If it's armor is 0, it becomes vulnerable+.

Actions.Name: Ancient Geo
Actions.Effect: Dazed foes take +[D] from either effect.

Actions.Name: Earthforce
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe or piece of terrain is shoved 3. If a piece of terrain is shoved, characters in its path are shoved 1 to either side, then take fray damage and become dazed.

Actions.Name: Hurl Self
Actions.Description: The Boulder hob reduces its max hp by 25%, hurling part of itself at a foe. A foe in range 5 must save or take 3[D], be shoved 3, and become stunned. On a successful save, they are shoved 1 and take [D]. Then, create a height 1 terrain piece adjacent to that foe. The hob can reduce its hp to 0 and defeat itself with this move.
